title: Please Riot I love your game. Help me
body: hello, riot starting 5/7/2017 my league of legend's' patcher has stopped working I have tried all methods,  that have been posted in all official riot community post. I have deleted league and have redownloaded the files. But still no results. please email me at roywrightmaloney@gmail.com for any information that may be of any use.

replies.body: When you say it's not working, what exactly is going on? Will the patch never go through or does league just not respond at all? Depending on what specifically is happening will decide on how we need to troubleshoot!
the patch doesn't go through hence the patcher crashing

Hmmmm there might be some issues with OS permission settings that are blocking your patcher from scanning the files correctly in order to patch. Let's make sure to go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to adjust those settings. Hit me back if that doesn't get the patcher working again!
the patch doesnt go through hence the patcher crashing
